Title: What the heck?! My "Just the Time" fitbit clock face has a 2/5 rating: It's literally just the time....
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: What the heck?! My "Just the Time" fitbit clock face has a 2/5 rating: It's literally just the time. It does just what it says it does. And it's literally the only one that's just the time despite infinity labeled as "minimalist".
